name: kingcup
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small plant with bright yellow flowers that grows in wet ground: The pond is well-stocked with arum lilies, kingcups, and water lilies. In sheltered areas, both kingcup and celandine were in flower.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dyke sides were covered with brilliant yellow ribbons of kingcups.Kingcup (Caltha palustris) grows in clumps 30 to 50 centimetres high. People think of kingcup as a spring flower, but the double form often flowers again in August or September.
